text: Lee Nak-yon (, born 20 December 1951), also known as Lee Nak-yon, is a South Korea politician. He was the 45th Prime Minister of South Korea. He founded the New Future Democratic Party in 2024. He was the party's nominee for President of South Korea in the 2025 snap presidential election until he dropped out a month before the election. ==References== Category:1951 births Category:Living people Category:Prime Ministers of South Korea
title: Lee Nak-yon
